item.description:
http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=177784265622583

Please join us for a pub crawl to promote HR 1139 "Keep Your Tips Act" following an important NH straw poll.

more info on the straw poll here: http://www.facebook.com/ev ent.php?eid=218573971514342

If you would like to get a ticket for a private bus that departs Manchester at 9:00 a.m. for the straw poll, drives you from the straw poll to the beach, from the beach to the pub crawl, and finally back to Manchester, go to this page and RSVP: http://www.facebook.com/ev ent.php?eid=116442425120441

If you are bringing anyone with you, write a comment to that effect. There are 22 seats. 3 are now officially spoken for. Bus tickets are $15 each.

official agenda:
Portsmouth Brewery * 56 Market Street * 5pm - 6pm
Daniel Street Tavern * 111 Daniel Street * 6:15pm - 6:45pm
Press Room Restaurant * 77 Daniel Street * 7:00pm - 7:30pm
State Street Saloon * 268 State Street * 7:45pm - 8:15pm
Coat of Arms * 174 Fleet Street * 8:30pm -
item.name: Portsmouth Pub Crawl for HR 1139 "Keep Your Tips Act"
